title: Mera Pehla Blog
content: Yeh mera pehla blog hai jo JSON file ke through load ho raha hai. Isme maine blogging ka basic idea share kiya hai.

title: Technology aur Life
content: Technology insaan ki life ko easy banati hai, lekin uske sahi use par depend karta hai. Agar wisely use karein toh life aur productive ban sakti hai.

title: Philosophy
content: Zindagi ek safar hai, aur har experience ek naya chapter likhta hai. Philosophy humein life ke deeper meaning samjhane mein help karti hai.
